name: Excelsor
overview: Excelsor is an arcade science fiction shooter. The action takes place in the Year 2136, after discovering Molecular transportation devices. Hostile alien race finds a way to separate souls from the body during the transportation process. The souls have changed into pure energy and are suspended in the space. The human bodies have become food for an alien race. Equipped with a laser gun with unlimited beams and Excelsior Prototype Jetpack the player must save the human race by shooting Soul Stars, Nexus Pulsars and Soul Suckers.
